titles.title: HP454 The God who sent the prophets

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The God who sent the prophets
Inspired them for our good,
To help us face the menace
Of evils they withstood.
How faithfully they warn us,
From Israel's stormy past,
That those who sow injustice
Will reap the holocaust!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The say the Judge of nations
Is making all things new;
That when the many fail him
He saves us by the few.
In this prophetic promise
Our anxious spirits rest:
In them, his chosen Remnant,
The future shall be blessed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yet not by being righteous
May we secure our place,
Or think to serve the future
Save in the strength of grace.
For there is but one Saviour,
The One we crucified,
The lonely Suffering Servant,
Who call us by his side.
